title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.73 - Cost
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.73 - Cost

State Regulations

An expenditure or outlay of cash, other property, capital
stock, or services, or the incurring of a liability therefor, identified with
goods or services acquired or with any loss incurred, and measured by the
amount of cash paid or payable or the market value of other property, capital
stock, or services given in exchange or, in other situations, any commonly
accepted basis of valuation. Implicit in the concept of cost is the accrual
basis of accounting. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.73

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
